extension.valueString: ¿Cuál de las siguientes describe su horario de trabajo durante los últimos 3 meses? (incluya todos sus empleos)

question.text: Which of the following best describes your overall work schedule (include all jobs) for the last three months?

option.code: I have consistently worked a traditional shift (morning to late afternoon)
option.display: I have consistently worked a traditional shift (morning to late afternoon)

option.code: I have consistently worked at an evening or night shift (starting late afternoon or early evening and continuing into the night)
option.display: I have consistently worked at an evening or night shift (starting late afternoon or early evening and continuing into the night)

option.code: I have consistently worked at an early morning shift (starting in the middle of the night and continuing into morning)
option.display: I have consistently worked at an early morning shift (starting in the middle of the night and continuing into morning)

option.code: I have consistently worked, but my shifts have been variable (including some mix of traditional, evening/night, and /or early morning shifts)
option.display: I have consistently worked, but my shifts have been variable (including some mix of traditional, evening/night, and /or early morning shifts)

option.code: I have not worked consistently over the past 3 months
option.display: I have not worked consistently over the past 3 months

question.text: Normally, I work _____ days/week.
On the days that you work, how many hours per day do you normally work, in all jobs or businesses?
